remarks.format:
## Remarks The MappingType enumeration is used when getting or setting the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnMapping%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>. The property determines how a column's values will be written when the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.WriteXml%2A> method is called on a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to write the data and schema out as an XML document.
## Examples The following example returns the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnMapping%2A> property value for each column in a table.
